title: Lynda - Office 365 Essential Training: Excel
description:
Lynda - Office 365 Essential Training: Excel

This Course will be good to the Best for DL withing 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

8h 41m Beginner Sep 22, 2015 | Uploaded in Nov 3, 2015 by 2boweb
Subjects: Business Education + Elearning 
Software: Excel Office Office 365 
Author: Dennis Taylor 
 
Start mastering Excel, the world's most popular and powerful spreadsheet program, with Excel expert Dennis Taylor. Learn how to best enter and organize data, perform calculations with simple functions, work with multiple worksheets, format the appearance of your data and cells, and build charts and PivotTables. Other lessons cover the powerful IF, VLOOKUP, and COUNTIF family of functions; the Goal Seek, Solver, and other data analysis tools; and automating tasks with macros.
Topics include:

	â€¢	Adjusting rows and columns
	â€¢	Finding and replacing data
	â€¢	Printing and sharing worksheets
	â€¢	Creating charts and PivotTables
	â€¢	Inserting and deleting sheets
	â€¢	Using power functions such as IF and VLOOKUP
	â€¢	Password-protecting worksheets and workbooks
	â€¢	Sorting data
	â€¢	Analyzing data with Goal Seek and Solver
	â€¢	Creating and running macros
